𝐎𝐑𝐆𝐀𝐍𝐈𝐂 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐇𝐎𝐌𝐄𝐎𝐏𝐀𝐓𝐇𝐈𝐂 𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐌𝐔𝐋𝐀: Crafted with carefully selected organic ingredients, our vaginal ointment presents a natural and gentle approach to managing fishy odor, excessive discharge, and BV-related symptoms.

𝐒𝐎𝐎𝐓𝐇𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐂𝐎𝐌𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐓𝐈𝐍𝐆: Experience a reduction in itching, irritation, and discomfort linked to BV. Our homeopathic formula delivers a calming effect, promoting overall vaginal health and well-being.

𝐄𝐀𝐒𝐘-𝐓𝐎-𝐔𝐒𝐄 𝐏𝐑𝐄𝐅𝐈𝐋𝐋𝐄𝐃 𝐀𝐏𝐏𝐋𝐈𝐂𝐀𝐓𝐎𝐑𝐒: Each applicator comes pre-loaded with the ideal amount of ointment, ensuring a clean and convenient application process. Simply insert and gently apply for targeted alleviation.
𝐀𝐋𝐋-𝐍𝐀𝐓𝐔𝐑𝐀𝐋 𝐒𝐎𝐋𝐔𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍: Free from harsh chemicals and synthetic additives, our vaginal treatment serves as a safe and natural option for women seeking organic and holistic methods of feminine hygiene.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WHAT IS BACTERIAL VAGINOSIS? The vagina naturally contains different types of bacteria. Normally, the body maintains a perfect balance between the various bacteria and works to prevent certain types of bacteria from getting out of hand. However, this subtle imbalance can lead to bacterial vaginosis (BV). Bacterial vaginosis (BV) is a vaginal infection caused by bacteria. This is the most common cause of abnormal vaginal discharge in women of childbearing age (women who are not yet menopausal). Symptoms of bacterial vaginosis include: • Thin, vaginal discharge that may be gray, white or green. • Foul-smelling, "fishy" vaginal odor. • Vaginal itching. • Burning during urination.

GYNOCARE FOR TREATMENT AND RELIEF OF BACTERIAL VAGINOSIS (BV) The symptoms of BV can be unsettling, so it’s helpful to find a treatment that provides rapid relief. GynoCare is a clinically proven, non-antibiotic treatment for BV that helps relieve symptoms, including unpleasant vaginal odour and discharge. It helps to normalise vaginal pH and suppress the bacteria that cause BV. GynoCare works to treat BV by disrupting the attachment of BV-causing bacteria to the vaginal lining.

FAST ACTING Effectively prevent odors and discharge from changes in your pH, reduce itching in as little as 24 hours. Feel fresh, clean, and confident! SUPPORTS VAGINAL HEALTH Relieves symptoms related to recurrent bacterial vaginosis, including itching, irritation, unusual vaginal odor, or abnormal discharge, and is both affordable & easily accessible as an over-the-counter treatment. BACKED BY SCIENCE Many alternative feminine hygiene products are ineffective, but RHRI GynoCare treatment is proven to quickly restore that fresh feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had gotten a new partner earlier in the year and it had been some time between my last intimate encounter. My new partner messed with my ph balance. Which led to this! I wasn’t normal down there for some time and I couldn’t figure out why since it didn’t feel like a uti. I did some research and found this product. Worked like a gem! I only needed to use one soln from the package. I did this at night so the soln was inside all night. When I went to shower the following morning I literally felt so much better down there!!! I would highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product is easy to use and doesn't feel weird. It seems to have helped my ph get back on track because it resolved my symptoms but I'm still going to see my OB for a check to make sure I'm in the clear. Some people say that there could be some burning but the package does warn of that in advance--I didn't experience that. I will purchase this again. Since there's only 7 applications, I will probably buy more than 1 package. It's better to have this on hand so you can treat right away instead of waiting for a shipment!Update after 5 days: Changing to a 5 star. I'm not experiencing issues!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of Money!!
reviews.reviewText: Disappointed with this product. I got 6 tube and the box says 7. 2nd This didn’t work. For all my girlies. Just go to your Obgyn.. Bv is straight antibiotics and nothing else. Maybe herbal but not Amazon . Trust me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need to know
reviews.reviewText: I just used this product today, didn’t really burn I’ll update after all 7days have been used but if you read the box it says using this will make a condom less effective. I’m not sure what it does but you could have a higher chance of getting pregnant or getting an std. I didn’t see anyone else posting about that though it was important.

reviews.reviewText: It helps for sure. Definitely don't except it to do much if you have an actual infection. You still need to go to the doctor. It's great for after sex, use it over night. You will need a pad.
